title: Kisumu Telkom F.C.
text:
Kisumu Telkom is a Kenyan <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> club based in <a href="Kisumu">Kisumu</a>. The club was formerly known as Kisumu Postal, the name was changed in 1998. They were a member of the top division in Kenyan football. Their home stadium is <a href="Moi%20Stadium">Moi Stadium</a>. The club relegated from <a href="Kenyan%20Premier%20League">Kenyan Premier League</a> after 2005–2006 but the next season did not take part in <a href="Nationwide%20League%20%28Kenya%29">Nationwide League</a>, the second-tier league in Kenya.
The club is owned by <a href="Telkom%20Kenya">Telkom Kenya</a>.
